Audio.Locality: Poço Preto trail, Iguaçu NP, Parana state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a bird perched about 20m up in temperate forest subcanopy, having just caught a large orthopteran. Photos: link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486081111/ link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486653060/
